class Solution:
# @return a tuple, (index1, index2)
# 8:42
def twoSum(self, num, target):
map = {}
for i in range(len(num)):
if num[i] not in map:
map[target - num[i]] = i 1
else:
return map[num[i]], i 1

return -1, -1
